Title: Allows application to a court to compel compliance with a chemical test where a motorist is suspected to be under the influence and where the driver has refused a chemical test
Summary: Allows application to a court to compel compliance with a chemical test where a motorist is suspected to be under the influence and where the driver has refused a chemical test.
LawCode: Amd ยง1194, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to compulsory chemical tests
